title: An Act directing the city of Boston Police Department to waive the maximum age requirement for police officers for Jose Ortiz

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Holmes of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4256) of Russell E. Holmes (with the approval of the mayor and city council) for legislation to authorize the appointment of Jose Ortiz as a police officer in the city of Boston, notwithstanding the maximum age requirement.  Public Service.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Service
Hearing scheduled for 09/10/2025 from 1:00 PM-4:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 09/10/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:30 PM in A-1                                                                                                              and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
